author: jfernan2
body:
#### PR description:

Update the safer syntax for existing parameter :
(1) drop type specifications where the original parameter exists.
(2) using "clone" instead of "deepcopy"
(3) move all parameter inside the clone

As suggested here: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33659#pullrequestreview-658150041 

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix -l limited
title: Drop type specs for DT DQM
